value.title: Fill down and replace null/blank values in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to troubleshoot fill down and replace blank values.  If you are trying to fill down blank values or replace null values you might see that power query ignores it completely. In this video I will show you how to fix this issues. value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! Patrick looks at how to set it up and help use your data to highlight areas within a Visio diagram.  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/visiosample  Documentation: https://support.microsoft.com/office/add-visio-visuals-to-power-bi-reports-4f09be62-f436-45c2-93b0-4a0f66b1f5a7
